content.en: Gene clustering: Researchers have been exploring the use of algorithms to analyze gene expression data and improve our understanding of genes. They have developed various clustering algorithms, such as iterative clustering, gene shaving, and model-based clustering, to identify patterns and subsets of genes with similar expression patterns. These algorithms are being used to assess the quality of clustering methods, predict gene function, and uncover novel genes in microarray data. By comparing and validating different clustering algorithms, scientists are making advancements in the field of gene expression analysis.
content.da: Genklyngning: Forskere har udforsket brugen af algoritmer til at analysere genekspressionsdata og forbedre vores forståelse af gener. De har udviklet forskellige klyngealgoritmer, såsom iterative klynger, gene shaving og modelbaseret klyngning, for at identificere mønstre og undergrupper af gener med lignende ekspressionsmønstre. Disse algoritmer bliver brugt til at vurdere kvaliteten af klyngemetoder, forudsige genfunktion og opdage nye gener i mikroarray-data. Ved at sammenligne og validere forskellige klyngealgoritmer gør videnskabsfolk fremskridt inden for genekspressionsanalyse.
